name: Haywire (andrewoid, GmanAdvanced, PeaQueueAre)
description:
Android R10 awakes to a world he's not familiar with. Immediately he is attacked by the newer androids. Now he has to survive these haywire androids.

Collect new controls to continue further, and defeat the out of control androids, but be careful! If R10 uses up all his controls, he'll become immobile until he gathers more!

CREDITS:
Programmer: PeaQueueAre, GmanAdvanced

Artist/3D Remodel: andrewoid

Robinhood76: Dash Sound
CJDeets: Regular shot sound
mastafx: augmented shot sound
Ogrebane: impact sound
You're Perfect Studio: hover sound + confirm sound
passAirmangrace: Death Sound
elmasmalo1: collect sound
UI Materials: https://freepbr.com/c/sci-fi/
